PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Agfa Superpan Supreme safety film
CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, Aug 23, 1941, pg. 1 reads: ""Aida" Star, Director Call At Courier - Napoleon Reed and Maestro Frederick Vajda called at The Courier office Monday to meet Treasurer Mrs. R.L. Vann, a sponsor of the opera. Pictured, sitting, are Mrs. Vann and Mrs. Vajda.  Standing, the Maestro, director of the opera "Aida" to be presented in Syria Mosque Friday, the 29th; Julia B. Jones, Courier's Woman's Editor; Napoleon Reed, tenor, who will sing the role of Rhadames in opera. - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Jessie Vann and Mrs. Vajda seated, with opera director Frederick Vajda, Pittsburgh Courier Woman's Editor Julia Bumry Jones, and tenor Napoleon Reed, standing in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper office
